title: President Donald J. Trump Is Protecting The Nation by Modernizing and Expanding Sanctions to Combat Terrorism â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			
Issued on:
September 10, 2019
We must deny the terrorists safe haven, transit, funding, and any form of support for their vile and sinister ideology.
						President Donald J. Trump					MODERNIZING SANCTIONS: President Donald J. Trump is taking steps to expand and enhance the ability of the United States to sanction terrorists and those who finance them worldwide.COMBATING TERROR WORLDWIDE: The Trump Administration is bolstering our capabilities and efforts to defend against and combat terrorism worldwide. PROTECTING THE HOMELAND: The Trump Administration is committed to ensuring that America is secure and its citizens always remain safe from the threat of global terrorism.
